channel.title: Please read!
channel.description: I'm trying to get willow whacker to work by lorax and sumilion, Im only confused on 1 part, the colors. The script says start in draynor bank/ or willows and it says it auto picks colors but it really doesn;t work that well, so on line 881-889 it says this. function GotColor(ColorType: string): Boolean; begin case LowerCase(ColorType) of 'bank' : Result := (BankColor > 0); 'road' : Result := (RoadColor > 0); 'ladder': Result := (LadderColor > 0); 'quest' : Result := (QuestColor > 0); 'farm' : Result := (FarmingColor > 0); end; I Think i got most of it figuard out, for the bank color i just take the bank symbol in the top right corner map right? the gold symbol. for the road? where do i take the color from what road? for the ladder? where the heck is a ladder in draynor? for the quest symbol im fonfused because theres 1 quest symbol on the docks by the willwos and one by the pig place closer twords the bank. ANd fro the farm spot, thats the one right by the willows right? thank you so much for the help. o yeah, if anyone has the script where do i put the willow colors? i looked but it's a big script if you could give me the lines that would be great. thanks again. And i just noticed this but in the script it says 'Bar' so do i ge the color of the drink ion the mini map buy the willows? please answer any of these questions. sorry for the double posting. here you go. {=========================================================================] [ Port Sarim Willow Whacker ] [ ] [ NAME : Port Sarim Willow Whacker ] [ WRITER : Lorax + Sumilion ] [ CATEGORY : Woodcutter ] [ DESCRIPTION : Chops willows in PS and banks them ] [ USAGE : Start at the willows / in the bank ] [ AUTOCOLOR : Yes ] [ ] [ More Scripts can be found at ] [ www.Villu-Reborn.com ] [=========================================================================] [ Instructions. ] [=========================================================================] [ 1. USE Runescape with Low Detail, Very Bright. ] [ 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color. ] [ 3. Set Playernames and Passwords in the form (comes when started). ] [ 4. Start script Logged Out / Logged in ] [ 5. Set Colors or Leave at Zero to autopick ] [ 6. Have Axe in First inventoryslot or wielded and more in the bank ] [ 7. Setup lines below ] [=========================================================================] [ Credits to : ] [ WT-Fakawi --> For SRL and the SRL Community + FindFastRandoms ^^ ] [ StarBlaster100 --> For helping with all sorts of stuff ] [=========================================================================} program SLPSWW; {.include SRL/SRL.scar} {.include SRL/SRL/misc/Loading.scar} {.include SRL/SRL/misc/Trade.scar} {.include SRL/SRL/skill/WoodCutting.scar} Is that enough or do you want to see setup too?

item.title: Please read!
item.dc:creator: @iluvrs iluvrs
item.description:
@iluvrs wrote:

Ok than you, but whenever i start the script in the bank it fails at finding the best ax, i have a mithril ax in the first bank slot but it doesn’t pick it up, it just stays there till it loggs out. And lets just say my name on rs that i was useing is g lil mee it;s not but would me nick just be lil?
Basicaly, The script workds different for me than it does for everyone else. I have folowed people that are useing the same script and thy all walk the same path but if i let lspsww pick the colors it walks so weird and always ends up getting lost and logging off. and than it will say going to accoutn 1 but i odnt want it to logg on account 1. it dont have an account 1 i only wanted to use account 0 but if i set 0 where it says how many acounts do you wana use it says error on line 75.So are the people that are useing lspsww setting there own colors? if so will you show me how to set my own colors? pleas ehelp i just want this 1 script to wrok, and maybe a yew script oncei m lvl 60 wcing. please help im so mad that this isn;t working!

Read full topic

item.title: Please read!
item.dc:creator: @iluvrs iluvrs
item.description:
@iluvrs wrote:

I’m trying to get willow whacker to work by lorax and sumilion, Im only confused on 1 part, the colors. The script says start in draynor bank/ or willows and it says it auto picks colors but it really doesn;t work that well, so on line 881-889 it says this.
function GotColor(ColorType: string): Boolean;
begin
case LowerCase(ColorType) of
‘bank’ : Result := (BankColor > 0);
‘road’ : Result := (RoadColor > 0);
‘ladder’: Result := (LadderColor > 0);
‘quest’ : Result := (QuestColor > 0);
‘farm’ : Result := (FarmingColor > 0);
end;
I Think i got most of it figuard out,
for the bank color i just take the bank symbol in the top right corner map right? the gold symbol.
for the road? where do i take the color from what road?
for the ladder? where the heck is a ladder in draynor?
for the quest symbol im fonfused because theres 1 quest symbol on the docks by the willwos and one by the pig place closer twords the bank.
ANd fro the farm spot, thats the one right by the willows right?
thank you so much for the help.
o yeah, if anyone has the script where do i put the willow colors? i looked but it’s a big script if you could give me the lines that would be great. thanks again. And i just noticed this but in the script it says ‘Bar’ so do i ge the color of the drink ion the mini map buy the willows? please answer any of these questions.
sorry for the double posting.
here you go.
{=========================================================================]
[ Port Sarim Willow Whacker ]
[ ]
[ NAME : Port Sarim Willow Whacker ]
[ WRITER : Lorax + Sumilion ]
[ CATEGORY : Woodcutter ]
[ DESCRIPTION : Chops willows in PS and banks them ]
[ USAGE : Start at the willows / in the bank ]
[ AUTOCOLOR : Yes ]
[ ]
[ More Scripts can be found at ]
[ www.Villu-Reborn.com ]
[=========================================================================]
[ Instructions. ]
[=========================================================================]
[ 1. USE Runescape with Low Detail, Very Bright. ]
[ 2. Set your Screen to 32 bit TRUE color. ]
[ 3. Set Playernames and Passwords in the form (comes when started). ]
[ 4. Start script Logged Out / Logged in ]
[ 5. Set Colors or Leave at Zero to autopick ]
[ 6. Have Axe in First inventoryslot or wielded and more in the bank ]
[ 7. Setup lines below ]
[=========================================================================]
[ Credits to : ]
[ WT-Fakawi --> For SRL and the SRL Community + FindFastRandoms ^^ ]
[ StarBlaster100 --> For helping with all sorts of stuff ]
[=========================================================================}
program SLPSWW;
{.include SRL/SRL.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/misc/Loading.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/misc/Trade.scar}
{.include SRL/SRL/skill/WoodCutting.scar}
Is that enough or do you want to see setup too?

Read full topic
